author: National Bureau
text:
Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar will be awarded this year’s K. Veeramani Award for Social Justice, instituted and presented by the Periyar International based in Chicago.

The award is given out every year to an individual or institution that has contributed to the cause of social justice. Previous recipients include former Prime Minister V.P. Singh, former Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu M. Karunanidhi and former Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Mayawati.
title: Bihar CM to get social justice award
